user_query: Analyze how cryptocurrencies and central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) are influencing traditional banking operations, regulatory environments, and financial stability.

1.panel_description: Provide a general overview of the digital currency landscape.

1.handles: Retrieves the history and current state of cryptocurrencies.

input_vars.name: history_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the history and current state of cryptocurrencies.
input_vars.value: What is the history and current state of cryptocurrencies?

output_vars.name: crypto_history
output_vars.description: History and current state of cryptocurrencies.

2.handles: Retrieves key terms and definitions related to digital currencies.

input_vars.name: terms_query
input_vars.description: Query to get key terms and definitions related to digital currencies.
input_vars.value: What are the key terms and definitions related to digital currencies?

output_vars.name: digital_currency_terms
output_vars.description: Key terms and definitions related to digital currencies.

3.handles: Retrieves the significance of digital currencies in modern finance.

input_vars.name: significance_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the significance of digital currencies in modern finance.
input_vars.value: What is the significance of digital currencies in modern finance?

output_vars.name: digital_currency_significance
output_vars.description: Significance of digital currencies in modern finance.

2.panel_description: Delve into the evolution of cryptocurrencies.

1.handles: Retrieves the early development and milestones of cryptocurrencies.

input_vars.name: development_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the early development and milestones of cryptocurrencies.
input_vars.value: What are the early development and milestones of cryptocurrencies?

output_vars.name: crypto_development
output_vars.description: Early development and milestones of cryptocurrencies.

2.handles: Retrieves the growth of blockchain technologies.

input_vars.name: blockchain_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the growth of blockchain technologies.
input_vars.value: What is the growth of blockchain technologies?

3.handles: Retrieves the societal and economic impact of cryptocurrencies.

input_vars.name: impact_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the societal and economic impact of cryptocurrencies.
input_vars.value: What is the societal and economic impact of cryptocurrencies?

output_vars.name: crypto_impact
output_vars.description: Societal and economic impact of cryptocurrencies.

3.panel_description: Focus on Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs).

1.handles: Retrieves the motivations and objectives behind CBDCs.

input_vars.name: motivations_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the motivations and objectives behind CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the motivations and objectives behind CBDCs?

2.handles: Retrieves the current global development and adoption of CBDCs.

input_vars.name: development_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the current global development and adoption of CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What is the current global development and adoption of CBDCs?

output_vars.name: cbdc_development
output_vars.description: Current global development and adoption of CBDCs.

3.handles: Retrieves the technology models and design choices of CBDCs.

input_vars.name: technology_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the technology models and design choices of CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the technology models and design choices of CBDCs?

output_vars.name: cbdc_technology
output_vars.description: Technology models and design choices of CBDCs.

4.panel_description: Analyze how cryptocurrencies and CBDCs are influencing traditional banking operations.

1.handles: Retrieves the shifts in payment and settlement systems.

input_vars.name: payment_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the shifts in payment and settlement systems.
input_vars.value: What are the shifts in payment and settlement systems due to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

output_vars.name: payment_shifts
output_vars.description: Shifts in payment and settlement systems.

2.handles: Retrieves the influence on retail and commercial banking services.

input_vars.name: banking_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the influence on retail and commercial banking services.
input_vars.value: What is the influence of cryptocurrencies and CBDCs on retail and commercial banking services?

output_vars.name: banking_influence
output_vars.description: Influence on retail and commercial banking services.

3.handles: Retrieves the emerging banking models integrating digital currencies.

input_vars.name: models_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the emerging banking models integrating digital currencies.
input_vars.value: What are the emerging banking models integrating digital currencies?

output_vars.name: emerging_models
output_vars.description: Emerging banking models integrating digital currencies.

5.panel_description: Examine the current regulatory frameworks for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.

1.handles: Retrieves the current regulatory frameworks for cryptocurrencies.

input_vars.name: frameworks_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the current regulatory frameworks for cryptocurrencies.
input_vars.value: What are the current regulatory frameworks for cryptocurrencies?

2.handles: Retrieves the oversight and compliance for CBDCs.

input_vars.name: compliance_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the oversight and compliance for CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What is the oversight and compliance for CBDCs?

3.handles: Retrieves the ongoing policy debates and proposed reforms.

input_vars.name: debates_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the ongoing policy debates and proposed reforms.
input_vars.value: What are the ongoing policy debates and proposed reforms related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

output_vars.name: policy_debates
output_vars.description: Ongoing policy debates and proposed reforms.

6.panel_description: Assess the financial stability implications of cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.

1.handles: Retrieves the volatility and systemic risk in crypto markets.

input_vars.name: volatility_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the volatility and systemic risk in crypto markets.
input_vars.value: What is the volatility and systemic risk in crypto markets?

output_vars.name: crypto_volatility
output_vars.description: Volatility and systemic risk in crypto markets.

2.handles: Retrieves the macroeconomic and monetary policy considerations.

input_vars.name: macroeconomic_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the macroeconomic and monetary policy considerations related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the macroeconomic and monetary policy considerations related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

3.handles: Retrieves the risk mitigation and resilience measures.

input_vars.name: mitigation_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the risk mitigation and resilience measures related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the risk mitigation and resilience measures for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

7.panel_description: Explore the technological and security considerations of cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.

1.handles: Retrieves the blockchain innovations and scalability.

input_vars.name: innovations_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the blockchain innovations and scalability.
input_vars.value: What are the blockchain innovations and scalability solutions for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

2.handles: Retrieves the cybersecurity and fraud prevention measures.

input_vars.name: cybersecurity_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the cybersecurity and fraud prevention measures for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the cybersecurity and fraud prevention measures for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

3.handles: Retrieves the privacy challenges and data protection measures.

input_vars.name: privacy_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the privacy challenges and data protection measures for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the privacy challenges and data protection measures for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

8.panel_description: Examine the adoption of cryptocurrencies and CBDCs by financial institutions.

input_vars.name: investment_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the institutional investment strategies for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the institutional investment strategies for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

2.handles: Retrieves the cryptocurrency and CBDC implementation in banking operations.

input_vars.name: implementation_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the cryptocurrency and CBDC implementation in banking operations.
input_vars.value: How are cryptocurrencies and CBDCs being implemented in banking operations?

output_vars.name: banking_implementation
output_vars.description: Cryptocurrency and CBDC implementation in banking operations.

3.handles: Retrieves the partnerships, consortia, and collaborative initiatives.

input_vars.name: partnerships_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the partnerships, consortia, and collaborative initiatives related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the partnerships, consortia, and collaborative initiatives related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

9.panel_description: Present use cases and case studies of cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.

1.handles: Retrieves the country-specific CBDC pilots and launches.

input_vars.name: pilots_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the country-specific CBDC pilots and launches.
input_vars.value: What are the country-specific CBDC pilots and launches?

2.handles: Retrieves the cross-border transactions and remittance solutions.

input_vars.name: transactions_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the cross-border transactions and remittance solutions using cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the cross-border transactions and remittance solutions using cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

3.handles: Retrieves the examples of cryptocurrency-driven services.

input_vars.name: services_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the examples of cryptocurrency-driven services.
input_vars.value: What are the examples of cryptocurrency-driven services?

10.panel_description: Analyze current and emerging market trends related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.

1.handles: Retrieves the evolving role of stablecoins and DeFi.

input_vars.name: stablecoins_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the evolving role of stablecoins and DeFi.
input_vars.value: What is the evolving role of stablecoins and DeFi?

output_vars.name: stablecoin_role
output_vars.description: Evolving role of stablecoins and DeFi.

2.handles: Retrieves the ongoing innovations in digital asset infrastructure.

input_vars.name: infrastructure_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the ongoing innovations in digital asset infrastructure.
input_vars.value: What are the ongoing innovations in digital asset infrastructure?

output_vars.name: asset_innovations
output_vars.description: Ongoing innovations in digital asset infrastructure.

3.handles: Retrieves the interaction between regulated and unregulated markets.

input_vars.name: markets_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the interaction between regulated and unregulated markets related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What is the interaction between regulated and unregulated markets related to cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?

output_vars.name: market_interaction
output_vars.description: Interaction between regulated and unregulated markets.

11.panel_description: Provide a future outlook for cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.

1.handles: Retrieves the potential scenarios for cryptocurrencies.

input_vars.name: scenarios_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the potential scenarios for cryptocurrencies.
input_vars.value: What are the potential scenarios for cryptocurrencies?

2.handles: Retrieves the roadmaps for widespread CBDC adoption.

input_vars.name: roadmaps_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the roadmaps for widespread CBDC adoption.
input_vars.value: What are the roadmaps for widespread CBDC adoption?

3.handles: Retrieves the expert forecasts and perspectives.

input_vars.name: forecasts_query
input_vars.description: Query to get the expert forecasts and perspectives on cryptocurrencies and CBDCs.
input_vars.value: What are the expert forecasts and perspectives on cryptocurrencies and CBDCs?
